name: falteringly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is losing strength or purpose and stopping, or almost stopping: "There's something you ought to know", she began falteringly. The economy is recovering falteringly from last year's recession. See
falter
More examplesFewer examplesJane smiled falteringly.She listened patiently as the child falteringly read her the book.He could only answer falteringly.
